subject: Re: Fwd: New Afterpay page
preview: Hi William, All good, and you are very welcome. We have updated items 1 to 3 below. Regarding the additional time, the project took 6 hours as estimated you have 4 included in your plans, so you wi

full_threads.body:
Hi William, 

All good, and you are very welcome. 

We have updated items 1 to 3 below. 

Regarding the additional time, the project took 6 hours as estimated you have 4 included in your plans, so you will only receive  a bill for 2 extra hours (assuming there is no more tasks in between now and the end of the month). 

Have a great weekend!

You must be sick of me by now :-)

For DBD,


Please add "Payment Plans" as a menu option between 'fees and rebates' and 'patient info' (https://cbo.d.pr/5iFQc3) and then have three menu items below it

1) Afterpay (with new page)

2) Smile Fund click through to https://www.dbdental.com.au/fees/payment-plans/ (and delete "Payment Plans" from the 'fees and rebates' section)

3) Smile Save click through to https://www.dbdental.com.au/fees/payment-plans/ (the same as Smile Fund for now. We'll split the page later down the track).

Thanks mate!


Kind Regards,










william@cbo.me
Paid Media Specialist / Account Manager


P: 1300 660 285 · M: 0401 771 320


13/333 George St, Sydney NSW 2000

Hey Heath,

Just wanted to say massive thanks for yours and the team's assistance in getting the Afterpay's page live.

Noted on the DBD menu. I'll raise it up with the client.

Are you able to tell me how many additional hours will be billed to us this month, just so that we can bill our clients accordingly?


Kind Regards,










william@cbo.me
Paid Media Specialist / Account Manager

When can we expect to see DBD's? Hopefully today.

On mobile, the top banner looks skewed to the right (https://cbo.d.pr/nb2JNL). Is there anything that we can do about? The priority, however, is to launch DBD.

Thanks mate.


Kind Regards,

full_threads.body:
@joel Here is the page I started: https://www.nationaldentalcare.com.au/?page_id=23185&preview=true

And I here is the XD file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/02513tpdtfh9p8h/National%20Dental%20Care%20-%20AfterPay%20Landing%20Page.xd?dl=0
And public link: https://xd.adobe.com/view/f5b62822-c17b-4c7d-7f41-5bd012f81247-8387/?fullscreen&hints=off

Hi Heath,

Please see if we can squeeze in for tomorrow COB. Thank you.

Hi William,

We are full up for today so we would need to do it outside of hours, meaning it would incur a rush fee of double (so the 2 hours of coding would be charged at 4 hours for the NDC site). We would be able to have it ready by open of business tomorrow? 

Alternatively, I can push to see if we can squeeze it in tomorrow, absolute worst case will be Friday as mentioned.

Hi Heath,

Any chance for the coding to be fast-tracked to today? We are desperate...



Kind Regards,













William Yap

Level 13, 333 George St, Sydney NSW

Hi William, 

Yeah good minds think alike haha. If we can get the revised design to you faster, we will for sure. 

Regarding the DB Dental site, we can do this, however it will take you over your included 4 hours usage for the month. The design and dev for NDC are 2 hours each, so a total of 4 hours. If we do DB Dental this month, it will be an additional 2 hours (it will be quicker of course as there are elements we can repeat etc.) Let me know if you want us to proceed with it this month or push it to next month?

Thanks Heath,

I've just sent you an email at the same time you replied to mine haha. Thanks heaps on the update and ETA.

Please take a note at the additional request on the email I've sent through a sec ago, that we also need a DBD version.

Thanks heaps Heath!
